garm-bel-iblis-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
garm-bel-iblis-commander.expansion: Assault Frigate Mark II Expansion Pack SWM05
garm-bel-iblis-commander.name: Garm-Bel-Iblis
garm-bel-iblis-commander.ability: After deploying fleets, place 2 non-consecutive round tokens on this card. At the start of the Ship Phase during each round matching 1 of those tokens, each friendly ship may gain a number of command tokens equal to its command value.
